price: Ampa sε, Yεde Yεn nsεnkyerεnee ne tumi pefee somaa Mose,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
